title: The Force of Righteousness
description: Righteousness is a force now working on behalf of the believer-a free gift provided by Jesus at Calvary. It is the very nature of God now living in you to change you. The force of righteousness is God's powerful provision to make salvation meaningful in the real issues of daily living here on earth. In Kenneth Copeland's The Force of Righteousness you'll discover how Accept the gift of righteousness-rather than trying to earn it Break free from a sin-conscious life Stand in God's presence without a sense of guilt or condemnation Triumph over every trick Satan throws at you-and more! Don't let anything hold you back from accepting all God has for you. Discover your covenant rights and allow The Force of Righteousness to change your life. You'll never be the same again!
author: Kenneth Copeland
